content.text: The story of your planet is unlike that of most worlds. Earth has become a gathering place, a crossroads of souls from across this corner of the galaxy. To understand who you are and why you are here, you must understand the history that brought so many different streams of consciousness to this single sphere.

Most planetary populations evolve through the {term:densities} in relative uniformity. The entities of a world progress together, sharing common origins and experiences. Your Earth is different. It is somewhat unusual for a planetary complex to contain those from many, many various places in creation. This explains much about the difficulty your peoples have experienced in achieving unity.

You are experiencing third density with a large number of those who must repeat the cycle, souls who did not graduate from their home worlds and sought a new opportunity here. The orientation of your planet has been difficult to unify even with the aid of many teachers. This is not a flaw but a characteristic of Earth's unique role in this region of the cosmos.

To understand this gathering, we must look back, not merely thousands but hundreds of thousands of years. We must examine not only Earth but the other spheres of your solar system that once hosted conscious life. For the history of your planet cannot be separated from the history of {term:maldek} and {term:mars}.

Where your astronomers now observe the asteroid belt, there once existed a planet. {ref:astro:asteroid-belt} It had a name that has been largely lost to your history, though in certain quarters it was known as Maldek. This world hosted active first, second, and third density life. Its people developed a civilization, built cities, created technology. And then they destroyed themselves utterly.

The peoples of Maldek had a civilization somewhat similar to that which you call {ref:myth:plato-atlantis}. They gained much technological information and used it without care for the preservation of their sphere. They followed, to a majority extent, patterns of thought and action associated with the negative polarity, {term:service-to-self}. Yet this was, for the most part, couched in a sincere belief that seemed to them positive and of service to others.

This is a crucial point. The entities of Maldek did not consider themselves evil. They believed they were doing good. The devastation that wracked their biosphere and caused its disintegration resulted from what you call war. The escalation went to the furthest extent of the technology their social complex had at its disposal. This occurred approximately 705,000 of your years ago.

When a planet is destroyed, it is not merely a physical catastrophe. It is a spiritual one. None escaped. Every entity was caught in what might be called a knot, a tangle of fear so profound that they could not be reached by any being. For approximately 100,000 years, members of the {term:confederation} repeatedly attempted to aid them and failed.

Approximately 600,000 years ago, a Confederation {term:social-memory-complex} was finally able to begin relaxing this knot of fear. The entities were then transformed into the inner dimensions and underwent a lengthy process of healing.

The group decision was to place upon themselves a form of {term:karma} alleviation. {ref:trad:hinduism-karma} They chose to incarnate upon your planetary sphere in forms that were not acceptable human bodies. This transfer began approximately 500,000 years ago.

The lesson of Maldek echoes through your solar system's history: the sincere belief that one serves others while actually serving self can lead to catastrophe. {ref:phil:technology-ethics} without wisdom, power without love, advancement without spiritual grounding, these patterns have repeated. They need not repeat again.

sections.title: Mars and the Beginning of Earth's Cycle

content.text: The Red Planet, which you call Mars, was once home to active first, second, and third density vibrations. Its third-density population was attempting to learn the lessons of {term:love}. However, the tendencies of these people toward bellicose actions caused such difficulties in the atmospheric environment of their planet that it became inhospitable for third-density experience before the end of its cycle.

Approximately 75,000 years ago, at the beginning of Earth's third-density cycle, those known as the {term:guardians} made a decision. The genetic material of the Mars population was preserved and transferred to Earth. The {term:mind-body-spirit} complexes of Mars entities were thus able to incarnate on Earth in bodies prepared for them.
However, this transfer was seen by other Guardians as an infringement upon {term:free-will}. From this beginning action, the {term:quarantine} of your planet was instituted.
The quarantine is not a punishment but a protection. It ensures that the population of Earth must work out its own destiny through the exercise of free will.

Thus began Earth's 75,000-year {term:master-cycle} of third density. The first entities to experience it in human form were those from Mars, carrying with them the unfinished lessons of love and a new opportunity to choose differently.
Before we continue with Earth's history, we must understand a crucial feature of third-density experience on this planet: the {term:veil} of forgetting.

In the earliest creations of this {term:octave}, there was no forgetting. The first beings experienced third density while retaining full awareness of who they were. The result was problematic. These non-veiled entities progressed very slowly.

The veiling was an experiment introduced by later {term:logos} entities. It proved so effective at increasing {term:polarity} that it was adopted by all subsequent {term:sub-logos}. Your sun employs the veil. Earth's third density operates under this condition of forgetting.

When the forgetting has occurred, experiences are sharpened to a degree beyond imagination. Third density becomes a marvelous and exciting place where experiences are vividly beautiful and exponentially more powerful.
You dwell in the darkness of unknowing. You spend third-density time deciding how to love. What a great decision. And for it, the veil is necessary.
The 75,000-year master cycle is divided into three {term:major-cycle}s of approximately 25,000 years each. The first major cycle saw the establishment of third-density experience on your planet.

Approximately 53,000 years ago, a civilization arose that you know as Lemuria, or Mu. Its people possessed very advanced spiritual {term:distortion}s but were not sophisticated in material manipulation.
Lemuria was a helpful and harmless place. Approximately 50,000 years ago, it was destroyed by natural catastrophe when the land mass was washed beneath the ocean.
At the end of the first major cycle, a {term:harvest} was attempted. None were harvestable. The entities of Earth would continue their learning in another cycle.
The second major cycle, spanning from approximately 50,000 to 25,000 years ago, was characterized by scattered developments across the globe.
There were positive steps in activating the green-ray energy complex, the heart center, in many portions of your planetary sphere. Approximately 31,000 years ago, the beginning of Atlantis formed.
At the end of the second major cycle, another harvest was attempted. Again, the results were minimal.

sections.title: The Rise and Fall of Atlantis

content.text: The third major cycle saw the rise and fall of Atlantis. It developed strong social structures and very great technological understandings.

The Atlanteans reached a level of philosophical understanding sufficient to attract the attention of the Confederation. Information was passed having to do with crystals and pyramids. But those trained began to use crystal powers for purposes other than healing. Power corrupted the teachings.
The result was separation, conflict, and war. Approximately 10,821 years ago, the first great Atlantean catastrophe occurred. The last great land masses sank approximately 9,600 years ago.
The parallel with Maldek is unmistakable. Once again, technology without wisdom led to devastation.

Approximately 11,000 years ago, Confederation entities came to Egypt and South America. The pyramids were created through the use of {term:intelligent-energy} working with the consciousness of the living stone.
The Great Pyramid at Giza was formed approximately 6,000 years ago through thought. {ref:hist:giza-pyramids} The pyramid shape creates conditions conducive to healing and expansion of consciousness.

However, the technology was reserved largely for those with distortions toward power. One entity, Akhenaten, was able to perceive the information without significant distortion, but at his death, the teachings became quickly perverted.
The history of Earth has not been shaped by positive influences alone. The quarantine has been breached on multiple occasions by entities of negative polarity.

Approximately 3,600 years ago, there was an influx of the {term:orion-group}. These entities of negative polarity worked with those who saw themselves as elite. They offer power, control, the ability to manipulate others.
Thus began what has been called the battle of Armageddon, a conflict between those who would teach unity and those who would promote separation. This battle continues to the present day.
You stand now at the end of the third major cycle, the completion of the 75,000-year master cycle. The {term:harvest} is upon you. The transition to fourth density has already begun.
The challenge and immediacy of {term:the-choice} is upon each of you. Time grows near when there shall no longer be incarnational opportunities in third density for your planet.
The conditions of mind that destroyed Maldek, that ruined Mars, that sank Atlantis, these conditions exist upon your planet today. Yet the outcome is not predetermined. The future remains fluid.
This is why you are here. What happens here matters. What you choose matters.
First: technology without wisdom leads to destruction. Your civilization has reached a level of technological capability similar to that of Atlantis and Maldek. The same choice confronts you.
Second: spiritual teachings, however pure in origin, are subject to distortion. The truth remains available to those who seek it sincerely.
Third: the diversity of Earth's population is both challenge and opportunity. You carry the karma of multiple worlds.
Fourth: the veil of forgetting creates opportunity. Your choices, made without memory of who you truly are, carry weight that choices made in full knowledge cannot possess.
Finally: the harvest approaches, but the outcome is not fixed. Every day, every choice, every act of love or fear contributes to what will be.
The story of Earth is not over. You are writing its next chapter now.
